text: An undrafted sportsperson or undrafted free agent is a type of sportsperson who plays, or tries to play, in a professional sports league. Every eligible player who is not chosen in their league's draft is an undrafted sportsperson. == Notable undrafted sportsperson == Note: These lists are not complete: === Undrafted basketball players=== * Ben Wallace * Raja Bell === Undrafted hockey players=== *Ed Belfour *Wayne Gretzky === Undrafted football players === * Adam Vinatieri * Antonio Gates * Jake Delhomme * Kurt Warner * Priest Holmes * Rod Smith * Tony Romo * Warren Moon Category:Sports words Category:Lists of sportspeople en:Free agent#Undrafted free agent
title: Undrafted sportsperson
